PLO1.title: Knowledge and Understanding
PLO1.refers_to: Demonstrate foundational and advanced disciplinary knowledge with awareness of professional, societal, and global contexts.

PLO2.title: Cognitive Skills
PLO2.refers_to: Apply critical and analytical thinking to analyse complex problems and make informed decisions.

PLO3.title: Practical Skills
PLO3.refers_to: Perform, adapt, and refine practical and technical skills in accordance with professional standards.

PLO4.title: Interpersonal Skills
PLO4.refers_to: Collaborate effectively and ethically with individuals and teams from diverse backgrounds.

PLO5.title: Communication Skills
PLO5.refers_to: Communicate ideas, information, and arguments clearly and ethically in oral, written, and digital forms.

PLO6.title: Digital Skills
PLO6.refers_to: Use digital tools, data, and technologies responsibly to analyse problems and solve tasks in professional contexts.

PLO7.title: Numeracy Skills
PLO7.refers_to: Apply mathematical, statistical, and quantitative reasoning to interpret data and support decision-making.

PLO8.title: Leadership, Autonomy and Responsibility
PLO8.refers_to: Demonstrate leadership, accountability, and autonomy in professional and organisational environments.

PLO9.title: Personal Skills
PLO9.refers_to: Demonstrate self-awareness, reflective practice, and commitment to personal development and well-being.

PLO10.title: Entrepreneurial Skills
PLO10.refers_to: Apply entrepreneurial and innovative thinking to create value in professional and societal contexts.

PLO11.title: Ethics and Professionalism
PLO11.refers_to: Uphold ethical principles, professional conduct, and responsible decision-making in practice.
